pages.text: A javelin empowered by $(will)Demon Will$(), similar to the Sentient Sword. This weapon scales in power based on the amount and type of will in the area. When thrown, it applies $(bold)AOE damage and effects$() to all nearby enemies, making it a devastating ranged weapon for will-empowered combatants.

Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() by combining a $(item)Diamond Spear$() with a $(item)Petty Tartaric Gem$(). The Sentient Spear gains the power to harness demon will while retaining its throwing capabilities.

pages.title: Will Source & Scaling
pages.text: The Sentient Spear draws power from $(bold)demon will stored in Soul Gems$() in your inventory (Tartaric Gems). It scales with will amount in 5 levels:$(br2)$(bold)Level 0:$() 0-15 will$(br)$(bold)Level 1:$() 16-59 will$(br)$(bold)Level 2:$() 60-199 will$(br)$(bold)Level 3:$() 200-399 will$(br)$(bold)Level 4:$() 400-999 will$(br)$(bold)Level 5:$() 1000+ will$(br2)Higher levels grant increased damage, faster attack speed, and more powerful effects!

pages.title: Will Type Effects
pages.text: The Sentient Spear adapts to the $(bold)demon will type with the highest amount$() in your soul gems:$(br2)$(will)Corrosive/Default:$()$(br)Applies Wither effect to targets$(br2)$(will)Destructive:$()$(br)Massive damage bonus (1.5 to 7.0)$(br2)$(will)Vengeful:$()$(br)Increased attack speed and movement$(br2)$(will)Steadfast:$()$(br)Grants Absorption to the wielder$(br2)$(italic)Each attack and throw drains demon will from your gems.$()

pages.title: AOE Mechanics
pages.text: When thrown, the Sentient Spear unleashes its power:$(br2)$(bold)AOE Damage:$()$(br)All enemies within 5 blocks of impact take damage$(br2)$(bold)Will Effects:$()$(br)Demon will effects (Wither, Absorption, etc.) are applied to $(bold)all AOE targets$(), not just the direct hit!$(br2)$(bold)Will Drain:$()$(br)Throwing costs 2x the normal will drain$(br2)$(italic)A single throw can afflict an entire group of enemies with demon will effects.$()

pages.title: Special Properties
pages.text: $(bold)Built-in Loyalty:$()$(br)The Sentient Spear automatically returns to you when thrown, like a trident with max-level Loyalty. Cannot be enchanted with Loyalty since it's already built-in.$(br2)$(bold)Shield Blocking:$()$(br)While holding a shield in your other hand, you can Sneak + Right-Click to block with the shield instead of throwing the pilum. This allows you to defend while wielding the pilum!$(br2)$(italic)Harness demon will with confidence.$()
